stories.text:
Hi HN!

My name is Artem (https://www.linkedin.com/in/artem-bezrukov-a59a5424/). I worked for 5 years in an international VC fund Altair VC; early investors in Miro, Deel, Pandadoc and many more great startups.

Recently I found out that my experience is very helpful to startups to help them excel their pitch, better show their strenghts and better negotiate.

So I decided to build a marketplace for such professionals (usually with 3-5+ years of experience) to help companies fundraise easier and faster.

We welcome both startups (you can start with a free call, get some advice) and VC professionals.
stories.title: Show HN: A marketplace of vetted VC experts to help startups fundraise faster

stories.text: There's a website I find myself checking several times a day to see if a certain thing has happened. I thought about writing a scraper that would email me if the value of a particular element on the site has changed, but then I figured someone must surely have created a SaaS app that does that. Does anyone here know?
stories.title: Ask HN: Looking for a simple scraper service with email notifications
